column1: Try and keep your combo up for maximum points!
Mixing up your moves gives you more points
If you're running low on gas, pick up a can
Swole zombies are hard to kill, but give more points
Can you find the hard-to-reach golden zombies?
The faster you go, the less the zombies can hurt you
Tilting can help you fit through small gaps
You can boost backwards to get out of tough situations
Some objects like crates and barrels can be hit for extra points
Your combo timer slows down in midair
Some areas give extra points for discovering them
Remember to spend your souls in the shop!
